description: The Senior Backend Developer is a single point of failure for all implementation tasks. Their unavailability would halt all progress on this workstream.
mitigation_strategy: Implement mandatory pair programming sessions with another senior developer for knowledge transfer on critical tasks (migration, encryption).
contingency_plan: Engage a pre-vetted contractor with senior .NET skills if the primary developer is unavailable for more than one sprint.
monitoring_trigger: Primary developer's planned or unplanned leave exceeds 3 days.

description: The audit trail design (TASK-SEC-007) may not meet SOC 2/ISO 27001 requirements due to misinterpretation of standards, leading to failed audits and significant rework.
mitigation_strategy: Budget for and schedule a formal design review with an external compliance consultant before beginning implementation (TASK-SEC-008).
contingency_plan: If design fails review, pivot to an out-of-the-box solution (e.g., dedicated audit log service) even if it increases operational cost.
monitoring_trigger: Negative feedback from internal or external compliance review.
